<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An implementation of the Window Scheduling software pipelining algorithm.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The fundamental concept of the window scheduling algorithm involves folding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the original MBB at a specific position, followed by list scheduling on the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// folded MIs. The optimal scheduling result is then chosen from various folding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// positions as the final scheduling outcome.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The primary challenge in this algorithm lies in generating the folded MIs and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// establishing their dependencies. We have innovatively employed a new MBB,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// created by copying the original MBB three times, known as TripleMBB. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TripleMBB enables the convenient implementation of MI folding and dependency</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// establishment. To facilitate the algorithm&#39;s implementation, we have also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// devised data structures such as OriMIs, TriMIs, TriToOri, and OriToCycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Another challenge in the algorithm is the scheduling of phis. Semantically,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it is difficult to place the phis in the window and perform list scheduling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Therefore, we schedule these phis separately after each list scheduling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The provided implementation is designed for use before the Register Allocator</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (RA). If the target requires implementation after RA, it is recommended to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reimplement analyseII(), schedulePhi(), and expand(). Additionally,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// target-specific logic can be added in initialize(), preProcess(), and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// postProcess().</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Lastly, it is worth mentioning that getSearchIndexes() is an important</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function. We have experimented with more complex heuristics on downstream</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// target and achieved favorable results.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/windowscheduler-h">llvm/CodeGen/WindowScheduler.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(2));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewDef =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// New uses are updated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefRegPair : DefPairs)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewMI-&gt;readsRegister(DefRegPair.first, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a9301a41a35d6aa7367def5ea6fd78db7">TRI</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewUse = DefRegPair.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note the update process for &#39;%1 -&gt; %9&#39; in &#39;%10 = sub i32 %9, %3&#39;:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BB.3:                                  DefPairs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ==================================</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %1 = phi i32 &#91;%2, %BB.1&#93;, &#91;%7, %BB.3&#93;  (%1,%7)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ==================================</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %4 = sub i32 %1, %3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %7 = add i32 %5, %6</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ----------------------------------</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %8 = sub i32 %7, %3                    (%1,%7),(%4,%8)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %9 = add i32 %5, %6                    (%1,%7),(%4,%8),(%7,%9)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ----------------------------------</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %10 = sub i32 %9, %3                   (%1,%7),(%4,%10),(%7,%9)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...            ^</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %11 = add i32 %5, %6                   (%1,%7),(%4,%10),(%7,%11)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ==================================</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//          &lt; Terminators &gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ==================================</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DefPairs.count(NewUse))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">            NewUse = DefPairs&#91;NewUse&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">          NewMI-&gt;substituteRegister(DefRegPair.first, NewUse, 0, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a9301a41a35d6aa7367def5ea6fd78db7">TRI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DefPairs is updated at last.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;NewDef : NewDefs)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">        DefPairs&#91;NewDef.first&#93; = NewDef.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a690d8e3b14e796b870f58d3d8f7e2a77">MBB</a>-&gt;push&#95;back(NewMI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#afbe266c442e9313e05ebffb703c2bd36">TriMIs</a>.push&#95;back(NewMI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a7e8c400b0b728b6ec230f0b487c6af44">TriToOri</a>&#91;NewMI&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Step 3: The registers used by phis are updated, and they are generated in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the third copy of MBB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the privious example, the old phi is:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %1 = phi i32 &#91;%2, %BB.1&#93;, &#91;%7, %BB.3&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The new phi is:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %1 = phi i32 &#91;%2, %BB.1&#93;, &#91;%11, %BB.3&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Phi : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a690d8e3b14e796b870f58d3d8f7e2a77">MBB</a>-&gt;phis()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefRegPair : DefPairs)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Phi.readsRegister(DefRegPair.first, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a9301a41a35d6aa7367def5ea6fd78db7">TRI</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">        Phi.substituteRegister(DefRegPair.first, DefRegPair.second, 0, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a9301a41a35d6aa7367def5ea6fd78db7">TRI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#af78f1d6e142343589981887d2a200d84"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#af78f1d6e142343589981887d2a200d84">WindowScheduler::getSearchIndexes</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SearchNum,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SearchRatio) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We use SearchRatio to get the index range, and then evenly get the indexes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// according to the SearchNum. This is a simple huristic. Depending on the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// characteristics of the target, more complex algorithms can be used for both</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// performance and compilation time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SearchRatio &lt;= 100 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;SearchRatio should be equal or less than 100!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad4542ab1cab20715a2bc58b001a42e4b">SchedInstrNum</a> &#42; SearchRatio / 100;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Step = SearchNum &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; SearchNum &lt;= MaxIdx ? MaxIdx / SearchNum : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> SearchIndexes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx = 0; Idx &lt; MaxIdx; Idx += Step)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">    SearchIndexes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Idx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SearchIndexes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8b0679e70ea74a5f5f3a7fe8060a86e6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8b0679e70ea74a5f5f3a7fe8060a86e6">WindowScheduler::getEstimatedII</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs">ScheduleDAGInstrs</a> &amp;DAG) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sometimes MaxDepth is 0, so it should be limited to the minimum of 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxDepth = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;SU : DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a3d5aacd5fc7d6a739ce913974ed1e53d">SUnits</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">    MaxDepth = std::max(SU.getDepth() + SU.Latency, MaxDepth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxDepth &#42; WindowIICoeff;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a5722fabe6420b0f87a3eb1160979e5f7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a5722fabe6420b0f87a3eb1160979e5f7">WindowScheduler::calculateMaxCycle</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs">ScheduleDAGInstrs</a> &amp;DAG,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InitII = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8b0679e70ea74a5f5f3a7fe8060a86e6">getEstimatedII</a>(DAG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resourcemanager">ResourceManager</a> RM(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a99f029742c003f8a0e5db1538d07988e">Subtarget</a>, &amp;DAG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">  RM.init(InitII);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ResourceManager and DAG are used to calculate the maximum cycle for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scheduled MIs. Since MIs in the Region have already been scheduled, the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// emit cycles can be estimated in order here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurCycle = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#adbdaac6e396c3d1dae6cee75cb2fee1f">getScheduleRange</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad4542ab1cab20715a2bc58b001a42e4b">SchedInstrNum</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SU = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs/#ab75cd37a7a0319d5a4c77189cca106ec">getSUnit</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExpectCycle = CurCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The predecessors of current MI determine its earliest issue cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Pred : SU-&gt;Preds) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pred.isWeak())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;PredMI = Pred.getSUnit()-&gt;getInstr();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PredCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad0494bc6a8f8231640ccc225d7a86847">getOriCycle</a>(PredMI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">      ExpectCycle = std::max(ExpectCycle, PredCycle + (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)Pred.getLatency());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Zero cost instructions do not need to check resource.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad8a9c20c5c819e59cd32906f691fbc2c">TII</a>-&gt;isZeroCost(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ResourceManager can be used to detect resource conflicts between the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current MI and the previously inserted MIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RM.canReserveResources(&#42;SU, CurCycle) || CurCycle &lt; ExpectCycle) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++CurCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurCycle == (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)<a href="#aff75f05d43156623f0a46d6599927f6b">WindowIILimit</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">      RM.reserveResources(&#42;SU, CurCycle);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a54d52175d63bed9f3b0bd9f6317e023e">OriToCycle</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a09475eec526bdf8626b3a02adad1fa28">getOriMI</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)&#93; = CurCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\tCycle &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; CurCycle &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &#91;S.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8f7e5d546027dc8ca8bb67c8b3f1b0cc">getOriStage</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a09475eec526bdf8626b3a02adad1fa28">getOriMI</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#93;: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;MaxCycle is &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; CurCycle &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// By utilizing TripleDAG, we can easily establish dependencies between A and B.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Based on the MaxCycle and the issue cycle of A and B, we can determine</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// whether it is necessary to add a stall cycle. This is because, without</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inserting the stall cycle, the latency constraint between A and B cannot be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// satisfied. The details are as follows:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// New MBB:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ========================================</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                 &lt; Phis &gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ========================================     (sliding direction)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MBB copy 1                                            |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                                                       V</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~|~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  ----schedule window-----</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                    |                                  |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ===================V====================              |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MBB copy 2      &lt; MI B &gt;                              |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                                                       |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                 &lt; MI A &gt;                              V</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~:~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  ------------------------</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                    :</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ===================V====================</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MBB copy 3      &lt; MI B&#39;&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ========================================</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//              &lt; Terminators &gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ========================================</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ae803ffd4decdd48471010ae2cb76d20d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ae803ffd4decdd48471010ae2cb76d20d">WindowScheduler::calculateStallCycle</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxCycle) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxStallCycle = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurrentII = MaxCycle + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#adbdaac6e396c3d1dae6cee75cb2fee1f">getScheduleRange</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad4542ab1cab20715a2bc58b001a42e4b">SchedInstrNum</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SU = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#aabfa4ddad621932351b720f8162030e8">TripleDAG</a>-&gt;getSUnit(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad0494bc6a8f8231640ccc225d7a86847">getOriCycle</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Succ : SU-&gt;Succs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Succ.isWeak() || Succ.getSUnit() == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#aabfa4ddad621932351b720f8162030e8">TripleDAG</a>-&gt;ExitSU)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the expected cycle does not exceed CurrentII, no check is needed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DefCycle + (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)Succ.getLatency() &lt;= CurrentII)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the cycle of the scheduled MI A is less than that of the scheduled</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MI B, the scheduling will fail because the lifetime of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// corresponding register exceeds II.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SuccMI = Succ.getSUnit()-&gt;getInstr();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad0494bc6a8f8231640ccc225d7a86847">getOriCycle</a>(SuccMI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DefCycle &lt; UseCycle)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#aff75f05d43156623f0a46d6599927f6b">WindowIILimit</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the stall cycle introduced by the register between two trips.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StallCycle = DefCycle + (int)Succ.getLatency() - CurrentII - UseCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">      MaxStallCycle = std::max(MaxStallCycle, StallCycle);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">          LateCycle = std::min(LateCycle, AntiCycle);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is no limit to the late cycle, a default value is given.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LateCycle == INT&#95;MAX)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">      LateCycle = (int)(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The issue cycle of phi is set to the latest cycle in the interval.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
